text: "Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U)" is a song by Dutch house group Hi_Tack, released on 6 December 2005. It samples the 1983 song "Say Say Say" by Paul McCartney and Michael Jackson. The song peaked at number three in Finland, number four in the United Kingdom, and number eight in Ireland. It also charted in countries such as the Netherlands, Denmark, Belgium and France. ==Track listing== #"Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U)" (Radio Edit) – 2:44 #"Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U)" (Original) – 7:34 #"Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U)" (Tocadisco's Not Guilty Remix) – 5:46 #"Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U)" (Delano Crocketts Late Nite Dub Mix) – 3:20 #"Beats 4 U" (Groeneveld & Van der Zwan) ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2005–2006) !Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ===Year- end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2006) !Position |- |Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) |align="center"|52 |- |UK Singles (Official Charts Company) |align="center"|61 |} ==References== Category:2005 debut singles Category:2005 songs Category:Disco songs Category:Electronic songs Category:House music songs Category:Songs written by Paul McCartney Category:Songs written by Michael Jackson Category:UK Dance Singles Chart number-one singles
title: Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U)
